trans-unit.source: Application Insights for C++ apps
trans-unit.target: Application Insights for C++ apps

trans-unit.source: Analyze usage and performance of your C++ app with Application Insights.
trans-unit.target: Analyze usage and performance of your C++ app with Application Insights.

trans-unit.source: Application Insights for C++ apps
trans-unit.target: Application Insights for C++ apps

trans-unit.source: Visual Studio Application Insights lets you monitor your mobile application for usage, events, and crashes.
trans-unit.target: Visual Studio Application Insights lets you monitor your mobile application for usage, events, and crashes.

trans-unit.source: Requirements
trans-unit.target: Requirements

trans-unit.source: You'll need:
trans-unit.target: You'll need:

trans-unit.source: A subscription with [Microsoft Azure](http://azure.com).
trans-unit.target: A subscription with [Microsoft Azure](http://azure.com).

trans-unit.source: You sign in with a Microsoft account, which you might have for Windows, XBox Live, or other Microsoft cloud services.
trans-unit.target: You sign in with a Microsoft account, which you might have for Windows, XBox Live, or other Microsoft cloud services.

trans-unit.source: Visual Studio 2015 or later.
trans-unit.target: Visual Studio 2015 or later.

trans-unit.source: Windows 10 Universal Application
trans-unit.target: Windows 10 Universal Application

trans-unit.source: Create an Application Insights resource
trans-unit.target: Create an Application Insights resource

trans-unit.source: In the [Azure portal][portal], create a new Application Insights resource.
trans-unit.target: In the [Azure portal][portal], create a new Application Insights resource.

trans-unit.source: Pick the Windows Phone or Windows Store option.
trans-unit.target: Pick the Windows Phone or Windows Store option.

trans-unit.source: Click New, Developer services, Application Insights
trans-unit.target: Click New, Developer services, Application Insights

trans-unit.source: The blade that opens is the place where you'll see performance and usage data about your app.
trans-unit.target: The blade that opens is the place where you'll see performance and usage data about your app.

trans-unit.source: To get back to it next time you login to Azure, you should find a tile for it on the start screen.
trans-unit.target: To get back to it next time you login to Azure, you should find a tile for it on the start screen.

trans-unit.source: Alternatively click Browse to find it.
trans-unit.target: Alternatively click Browse to find it.

trans-unit.source: Take a copy of the Instrumentation Key.
trans-unit.target: Take a copy of the Instrumentation Key.

trans-unit.source: The key identifies the resource, and you'll install it soon in the SDK to direct data to the resource.
trans-unit.target: The key identifies the resource, and you'll install it soon in the SDK to direct data to the resource.

trans-unit.source: Click Properties, select the key, and press ctrl+C
trans-unit.target: Click Properties, select the key, and press ctrl+C

trans-unit.source: Install the SDK in your application
trans-unit.target: Install the SDK in your application

trans-unit.source: In Visual Studio, edit the NuGet packages of your desktop app project.
trans-unit.target: In Visual Studio, edit the NuGet packages of your desktop app project.

trans-unit.source: Right-click the project and select Manage Nuget Packages
trans-unit.target: Right-click the project and select Manage Nuget Packages

trans-unit.source: Install Application Insights SDK for C++ Apps.
trans-unit.target: Install Application Insights SDK for C++ Apps.

trans-unit.source: Select **Include prerelease** and search for "Application Insights"
trans-unit.target: Select **Include prerelease** and search for "Application Insights"

trans-unit.source: In your projects settings for release and debug:
trans-unit.target: In your projects settings for release and debug:

trans-unit.source: Add $(SolutionDir)packages\ApplicationInsights-CPP.1.0.0-Beta\src\inc to the project properties -> VC++ Directories -> Include Directories
trans-unit.target: Add $(SolutionDir)packages\ApplicationInsights-CPP.1.0.0-Beta\src\inc to the project properties -> VC++ Directories -> Include Directories

trans-unit.source: Add $(SolutionDir)packages\ApplicationInsights.1.0.0-Beta\lib\native\<PLATFORM TYPE>\release\AppInsights_Win10-UAP to the project properties -> VC++ Directories -> Library Directories
trans-unit.target: Add $(SolutionDir)packages\ApplicationInsights.1.0.0-Beta\lib\native\<PLATFORM TYPE>\release\AppInsights_Win10-UAP to the project properties -> VC++ Directories -> Library Directories

trans-unit.source: Add ApplicationInsights.winmd as a reference to your project from $(SolutionDir)packages\ApplicationInsights.1.0.0-Beta\lib\native\<PLATFORM TYPE>\release\ApplicationInsights
trans-unit.target: Add ApplicationInsights.winmd as a reference to your project from $(SolutionDir)packages\ApplicationInsights.1.0.0-Beta\lib\native\<PLATFORM TYPE>\release\ApplicationInsights

trans-unit.source: Add the AppInsights_Win10-UAP.dll from $(SolutionDir)packages\ApplicationInsights.1.0.0-Beta\lib\native\<PLATFORM TYPE>\release\AppInsights_Win10-UAP.
trans-unit.target: Add the AppInsights_Win10-UAP.dll from $(SolutionDir)packages\ApplicationInsights.1.0.0-Beta\lib\native\<PLATFORM TYPE>\release\AppInsights_Win10-UAP.

trans-unit.source: Go to properties and set content to YES.
trans-unit.target: Go to properties and set content to YES.

trans-unit.source: This will copy the dll to your build directory.
trans-unit.target: This will copy the dll to your build directory.

trans-unit.source: To update the SDK to future versions
trans-unit.target: To update the SDK to future versions

trans-unit.source: When a new [SDK is released](app-insights-release-notes-windows-cpp.md):
trans-unit.target: When a new [SDK is released](app-insights-release-notes-windows-cpp.md):

trans-unit.source: In NuGet package manager, select the installed SDK and choose Action: Upgrade.
trans-unit.target: In NuGet package manager, select the installed SDK and choose Action: Upgrade.

trans-unit.source: Repeat the installation steps, using the new version number.
trans-unit.target: Repeat the installation steps, using the new version number.

trans-unit.source: Use the SDK
trans-unit.target: Use the SDK

trans-unit.source: Initialize the SDK and start tracking telemetry.
trans-unit.target: Initialize the SDK and start tracking telemetry.

trans-unit.source: In App.xaml.h:
trans-unit.target: In App.xaml.h:

trans-unit.source: Add:
trans-unit.target: Add:

trans-unit.source: In App.xaml.cpp:
trans-unit.target: In App.xaml.cpp:

trans-unit.source: Add:
trans-unit.target: Add:

trans-unit.source: In App:App()
trans-unit.target: In App:App()

trans-unit.source: Once you have created the root Frame, (usually at the end of App::OnLaunched) initalize m_session:
trans-unit.target: Once you have created the root Frame, (usually at the end of App::OnLaunched) initalize m_session:

trans-unit.source: To use tracking elsewhere in your application, you can declare an instance of Telemetry client.
trans-unit.target: To use tracking elsewhere in your application, you can declare an instance of Telemetry client.

trans-unit.source: Run your project
trans-unit.target: Run your project

trans-unit.source: Run your application to generate telemetry.
trans-unit.target: Run your application to generate telemetry.

trans-unit.source: You can either run it in debug more on your development machine, or publish it and let your users run it.
trans-unit.target: You can either run it in debug more on your development machine, or publish it and let your users run it.

trans-unit.source: View your data in Application Insights
trans-unit.target: View your data in Application Insights

trans-unit.source: Return to http://portal.azure.com and browse to your Application Insights resource.
trans-unit.target: Return to http://portal.azure.com and browse to your Application Insights resource.

trans-unit.source: Click Search to open [Diagnostic Search][diagnostic] - that's where the first events will appear.
trans-unit.target: Click Search to open [Diagnostic Search][diagnostic] - that's where the first events will appear.

trans-unit.source: If you don't see anything, wait a minute or two and click Refresh.
trans-unit.target: If you don't see anything, wait a minute or two and click Refresh.

trans-unit.source: Click Diagnostic Search
trans-unit.target: Click Diagnostic Search

trans-unit.source: As your app is used, data will appear in the overview blade.
trans-unit.target: As your app is used, data will appear in the overview blade.

trans-unit.source: Overview blade
trans-unit.target: Overview blade

trans-unit.source: Click on any chart to get more detail.
trans-unit.target: Click on any chart to get more detail.

trans-unit.source: For example, crashes:
trans-unit.target: For example, crashes:

trans-unit.source: Click the crash chart
trans-unit.target: Click the crash chart

trans-unit.source: Next Steps
trans-unit.target: Next Steps

trans-unit.target: [Track usage of your app][track]

trans-unit.target: [Use the API to send custom events and metrics][api]
